phrs.translation: 大满贯；满垒时的全垒打

sentences.sentence: She slams the kitchen door so hard I hear dishes rattle.
sentences.translation: 她砰地一下使劲关上厨房门，我听到盘子都震得嘎嘎响。

sentences.sentence: He is one of the greatest tennis players in the world and has achieved 18 grand slams altogether.
sentences.translation: 他是世界上最伟大的网球运动员之一，总共获得了18个大满贯。

sentences.sentence: He's about to stand up when WHAM! A shovel slams him square in the face.
sentences.translation: 就在他准备站起身来时，砰！一把铁铲迎面结实地击中了他的脸。
